projects.title: GitHub Explorer
projects.description: Discover amazing repositories and explore the world of open source development. Browse profiles, view repositories, and explore details with a clean, modern interface.

projects.title: Online Car Wash App
projects.description: A convenient mobile application for booking car wash services online. Features include service selection, appointment scheduling, and user profile management.

projects.title: Task Manager (GetX)
projects.description: An efficient task management application built with GetX for robust state management. Organize your daily tasks with ease and improve productivity.

projects.title: News App
projects.description: Stay updated with the latest headlines from around the world. Fetches live news data using a REST API and displays it in a user-friendly layout.

description: Working with the Betopia Group team to develop and maintain mobile applications.
Collaborating with designers and backend developers to ship high-quality features.
Implementing responsive UI and ensuring app performance.
Developed various mobile applications for clients using Flutter and Android native.
Created E-commerce, Utility, and Social networking apps.
Managed full development lifecycle from concept to deployment.
Train students to build software by using Flutter in app development courses.
Assist in debugging and solving code-related issues for students.
Assist students with physics lab experiments.
Invigilate exams and ensure academic integrity.
Evaluate lab reports and exam papers.

about.name: Md Abu Zafor
about.title: Mobile App Developer (Flutter)
description: Hello! My name is Md Abu Zafor and I'm a passionate Mobile App Developer (Flutter) from Bangladesh. I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, specifically mobile applications that solve real-world problems.
I'm currently working on SoD Manager and expanding my knowledge in cross-platform development. My main focus is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences.
